answers.answer: wowo that is amazing i'm very happy everything went well for you.i'm 9w and 3 days and still got 2 more weeks till my 1st Dr appointment ;)
That is great!!  How exciting your US is almost here!!!  You will have to be sure to let us know how it goes!!!
Yay! Can't wait to hear about your u/s!! =)

I'm feeling really crampy after the pelvic exam. And I noticed the smallest, tiniest streak of pale pink on the TP after my exam. I know it is from the pap smear and there's been nothing since. But my cervix HURTS!Has anyone else had a pap yet and your cervix hurt bad afterwards? I think I'm going to bed early tonight so I can rest.Definitely will post about the U/S when I have it!!!UmYusra- I'm sorry! It was hard to wait as long as I did for my appointment (a month) so I'm certain it's hard to see all of us having appointments. *HUGS* Each doctor's office is different. I think I was seen sooner because of previous miscarriages and problems.
same EDD as my sisters! my ultrasound is this coming Tuesday at 4:30 pm...4 more days i cant wait! i will be 9 weeks 4 days that day......yeah for everyone's upcoming u/s'.
Thats great! I go for my next u/s on thursday! Its killing me! I wanna see my baby again so bad! I will be 11 weeks. Even though ive already had like 4 or 5 u/s already im still excited!

I had a papsmear done at 5 weeks. It was uncomfortable but I was not in pain or did not experience pain afterwards. Excited for you and your u/s! I have mine on the 8th of april. ugh I cant wait!! I wish I could go every week. I'll be 12 weeks though so atleast the 1st trimester will be over.

question: Okay so my due date is October 20, 2009 as of now. My doc scheduled an u/s for next week so we will verify due date then and get to see Jelly Bean and a heartbeat!!!I also have to do the Glucola (Gestational Diabetes test) every trimester since I have PCOS and Diabetes is associated with PCOS. So tomorrow I do the 1-hr Glucola and other routine OB blood tests.I finally FEEL pregnant now that I'm in to see the doctor. Can't wait for the ultrasound. It's on Wednesday at 1:45pm (central time).
title: First appointment... finally!!!
